title: I lost just over 2000 be after logging out
body:
Upon reaching lvl 70 I received a glorious champion capsule and opened it to receive a mundo, kayn and shyvana champion shard. I then disenchanted each of them., after which I left and ate lunch. when I got back and logged in all the be I received was gone and so were the shards. please help I'm free to play and was looking forward to the be.


thankyou
